title: Sleep Paralysis - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/16/20
itunes:title: Sleep Paralysis - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/16/20
description:
George Noory and author Ryan Hurd discuss his research into sleep paralysis, where the body is paralyzed while the brain is conscious, how to deal with nightmares and night terrors, and what to do when you are scared to go to sleep.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An exploration into the frightening experience of sleep paralysis and nightmares.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
